Author: GitHub
Title: The Download: GitHub Universe, New Merch Drops & The story of Log4Shell
Description:
This week on The Download, we look back at one of the internet's biggest crises with Christian, a Log4j maintainer who shares his personal story of the Log4Shell vulnerability. Plus, we cover how you can get a free virtual pass to GitHub Universe and the new Universe 2025 Shop collection.

#TheDownload #DeveloperNews #GitHub

— CHAPTERS —

00:00 Welcome to The Download 00:24 Get your free virtual pass to GitHub Universe 00:53 The new GitHub Universe merch collection 01:15 The story of Log4Shell: A maintainer's perspective 02:06 This week's news recap
